entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person who needs to learn English and has made a promise with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who is hesitant to break her promise with Ron and Harry.

entities.name: hagrid

entities.name: norbert
entities.description: Norbert is mentioned as one of Hagrid's monster mates.

entities.name: aragog

relationships.description: Ron mentions that they have never come off better for mixing with any of Hagrid's monster mates.
Hermione and Harry made a promise together.
Ron is trying to convince Hermione to break her promise with Harry.
Hagrid has Norbert as one of his monster mates.
Hagrid also has Aragog as one of his monster mates.
